name: IPchanger VPN
summary: Chinese residential proxy provider (Zhimadaili/roxlabs.io) extension using Chrome Native Messaging as C2 channel from desktop app. Sends behavioral telemetry over unencrypted HTTP. Server-controlled proxy bypass list. Injects jQuery 1.8.3 into every page including file:// URLs. Baidu and Google websites can message the extension via externally_connectable.

vulnerabilities.title: Unencrypted Telemetry Transmission
vulnerabilities.description: Detailed user behavior tracking sent to rz.ipchanger.net and rz.ipchanger.321174.com over plain HTTP.

vulnerabilities.title: Server-Controlled Proxy Bypass List
vulnerabilities.description: Bypass list fetched from server controls which domains bypass the proxy, potentially excluding surveillance traffic.

flags.description: Behavioral telemetry sent over unencrypted HTTP to Chinese residential proxy infrastructure
Server-controlled bypass list and native messaging C2 channel from mandatory desktop app
